divs: Sighting DetailsI got this from my friend that went to vegas and and took a picture out the hotel window and he did not even see it untill I look at the pictures that he posted on facebook and there it was, now this could be a plane or something elese I don't now and he did not know eather. Maybe yall now more about this than we do. Thank you
